title: Backyard barbecue grills, Two swimming pools
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 932 Sq.
If you are searching for a place to live in the heart of Silicon Valley that reflects its innovative spirit and modern lifestyle, look no further than Avana Almaden.
We have tapped into this exciting and cutting-edge community to deliver modern apartment homes that perfectly accentuate the character of the city.
At Avana Almaden, an array of amenities provides a cozy and convenient place to stay plugged in when you are not spending time in the office.

Upgraded kitchens with stainless steel appliances and sleek quartz countertops*, Convenient in-home washer and dryer, Abundant closet space, Pre-wired for high speed internet, Additional storage available, Private patios and balconies, New designer lighting and fixtures*

Zen like scenery and tree lined walkways, Two swimming pools, Relaxing hydro jet spa, Bark Park and Bark n' Bubbles Dog Spa coming soon!, Professionally managed, Picnic area, Backyard barbecue grills, Covered parking available, Cabana lounges and cozy fire pit
Please call the Leasing Office for more details.
